about_the_game:
Answer distress calls and navigate alien spaceships in search of survivors whilst trying to avoid whatever terrible fate has befallen them in this co-op sci-fi horror. You and your fellow crewmates will have to use your cooperative skills and whatever equipment you can get your hands on to complete your mission and come out alive.

Features

  • Spaceships: Each ship has a procedurally generated interior and with multiple different styles of ship, each with their own unique rooms and features, every mission will feel different.
  • Danger: The ships occupants sent out a distress signal for a reason, you'll have to learn and adapt to each threat you face if you're going to survive.
  • Exploration: Figure out unfamiliar alien technology and locate survivors before you run out of oxygen.
  • Equipment: Make use of an array of different equipment to help you overcome the challenges you'll face during your mission.

Multiplayer

  • Co-op: Work together with your friends to complete your mission.
  • Teamwork: Assist your crewmates from your ship's computer and provide invaluable information whilst monitoring their progress or explore the ship together and figure it out as you go.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, blood and horror.

name: Interstellar Distress

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 4 player co-op horror where you answer distress calls and board spaceships in search of survivors.
